name: Breadfast
headline: Household needs, from bread to everything.
description: Breadfast is Egypt‚Äôs leading online grocery brand. We operate a fully vertically integrated supply chain, delivering 3,500 SKUs on-demand in under 60 minutes. Our selection includes a range of freshly baked bread, coffee, fruits, vegetables, eggs, dairy, meat and poultry, alongside a range of CPG staples designed to serve a household‚Äôs daily and weekly needs.

### Thousands of Products
From eggs, bakeries, dairy products, fruits and vegetables, frozen meats, pantry staples, laundry detergents, baby products, all the way to pet supplies, grooming and personal care kits, shop all your daily essentials from one seamless app. 
[ Explore Breadfast now! ](https://www.breadfast.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/breadfast/id1288436997>)
![Breadfast Delivery Tips](https://cdn.breadfast.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/img_da_web.png)
![Instant same-day delivery](https://cdn.breadfast.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/ic_scheduled_web.png)
##### Instant same-day delivery
Groceries and daily essentials available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, in minutes. 
![Freshness with every order](https://cdn.breadfast.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/ic_fresh_web.png)
##### Freshness with every order
Our bakeries, fruits and vegetables are baked, assembled, and prepared fresh every day. 
![Cairo, Alex. & more](https://cdn.breadfast.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/ic_fastdelivery_web.png)
##### Cairo, Alex. & more
Breadfast delivers to most areas in Cairo, Giza, Alexandria, and expanding across Egypt and the MENA region.

Apply Now

### Thousands of Products
From eggs, bakeries, dairy products, fruits and vegetables, frozen meats, pantry staples, laundry detergents, baby products, all the way to pet supplies, grooming and personal care kits, shop all your daily essentials from one seamless app. 
 Explore Breadfast now! ‚ü®11‚ü©
![Breadfast Delivery Tips‚ü®12‚ü©]
![Instant same-day delivery‚ü®13‚ü©]
##### Instant same-day delivery
Groceries and daily essentials available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, in minutes. 
![Freshness with every order‚ü®14‚ü©]
##### Freshness with every order
Our bakeries, fruits and vegetables are baked, assembled, and prepared fresh every day. 
![Cairo, Alex. & more‚ü®15‚ü©]
##### Cairo, Alex. & more
Breadfast delivers to most areas in Cairo, Giza, Alexandria, and expanding across Egypt and the MENA region.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Breadfast**  
- **Founded:** 2017  
- **Headquarters:** Cairo, Egypt  
- **Employees:** 1,200  
- **Backed By:** Y Combinator (Batch S19)  
- **Group Partner:** Michael Seibel  
- **Website:** [Breadfast.com](https://www.breadfast.com)  

### Mission
Breadfast is on a simple yet profound mission: to fulfill household needs by providing everything from bread to a wide array of grocery products. Their aim is to make shopping seamless and efficient for everyday essentials.

### What They Do
Initially launched as Egypt's leading online grocery brand, Breadfast has developed a fully integrated supply chain that delivers over 3,500 products on-demand, within 60 minutes. Their offerings cover a broad spectrum of grocery items‚Äîfreshly baked bread, coffee, fruits, vegetables, dairy products, meat, and staple goods‚Äîcatering to both daily and weekly household needs.

### Unique Selling Proposition
What sets Breadfast apart? It's not just the speed of delivery. They manage to keep their products fresh and high-quality by preparing and assembling them daily. Breadfast ensures that groceries and daily essentials are available 24/7, providing instant same-day delivery for their customers in various neighborhoods across Cairo, Giza, Alexandria, and plans for expansion across the MENA region.

### Product Range
From pantry staples to personal care products, Breadfast is essentially a one-stop shop. Here‚Äôs a peek at what you can find:
- **Fresh Products:** Fruits, vegetables, and bakery items.
- **Daily Essentials:** From eggs to dairy, frozen meats, and more.
- **Household Needs:** Everything from laundry detergents to baby products, pet supplies, and grooming kits.

### Future Aspirations
As the company continues to grow, they are not just looking at expanding their product offerings but are also focused on enriching the customer experience through technology. You can easily shop through their mobile app, available on both [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.breadfast&hl=en&gl=US) and the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/breadfast/id1288436997).

### Join the Team
Breadfast is actively hiring across various roles, from tech to supply chain operations. If you're interested in joining a dynamic and creative team, check out their careers page [here](https://www.breadfast.com/careers/).

### Conclusion
Breadfast isn‚Äôt just about groceries; it‚Äôs about revolutionizing the shopping experience in Egypt. Their commitment to freshness, speed, and customer satisfaction could very well place them at the forefront of the grocery delivery sector in the region. If you‚Äôre in Cairo or nearby, downloading their app might just simplify your life.
